text: HRa 77 TTHNf gfetaz<u (Tea 4ae- &r TTHRf #RiT4, MRT FRTTR) National Highways Authority of India H7rya T (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) 01-5 & 6, 7qez-10, aRqpl; # fcrlt 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, Delhi-110075 39 /Phone 91-11-25074100 / 25074200 NHAI/Policy Guidelines/ Dispute Resolution/2023 Policy Circular No.2.1.66/2023 dated 18th December, 2023 (Decision taken on E-Office File No. NHAI/Legal&Arb/VSV-Il(ContDisp) /BH/ JHPL/2023/01 (Comp. No. 215389)) Sub: Streamlining Process for Vivad Se Vishwas-II Cases reg: Presently the proposals under Vivad Se Vishwas-II are being processed in a manner that for every step approvals are being solicited separately such as- Step-1- Vetting of offer before uploading on GeM Portal/offering to the Contractor, Step-2" After receipt of acknowledgement on GeM Portal for adding further interest till date of acknowledgement, and Step-3- At the time of   finalization of Settlement Agreement for vetting the applicable taxes; 2 Henceforth, all the above will now be consolidated into a single stage. 2.1 Finance Division shall   provide an Excel sheet for calculation along with applicable taxes. 2.2 Technical Division shall add further interest till the date of acknowledgment on its own with applicable taxes in the calculations 3_ All Divisions & ROs/PIUs are advised to adhere to this single stage streamlined process to ensure the swift and efficient resolution of Vivad Se Vishwas-II cases. 4 This issues with the approval of Competent Authority: 131123 (Sanjay Kumar Patel) General Manager (Coord:) To: All Officers of NHAI HQ ROs/ PIUs CMUs Site Offices to: 13 Hindi Division for translation in Hindi. 2. Library for hosting the circular on library site. 3_ Web Admin for circulation. 'T79 NHAL New Copy
